hero.description: I'm a {frontendDeveloper} and {designer}. I enjoy creating simple, user friendly, efficient and vibrant websites.

aboutMeSpecialization.title: Specialization
aboutMeSpecialization.paragraph1: I specialize in front-end development using Angular, Vue, Javascript, and Typescript. I also feel confident working with CSS, SASS, and Tailwind CSS.
aboutMeSpecialization.paragraph2: I've built several dynamic projects and I'm excited to build more! I bring a diverse background, including business ownership, and fluency in English, Spanish, and Japanese

projects.project1Tagline: Cafe Triangle was a small cafe located in Kanazawa, Japan
projects.project2Tagline: A blog about my experience as a Mexican-American self-taught programmer
projects.project3Tagline: Cosmic Neighborhood is an immersive and interactive space-themed website
projects.project4Tagline: A horizontal scroll gallery filled with scroll triggered animations
projects.project5Tagline: My multi-lingual jr frontend developer portfolio website
projects.project6Tagline: A full featured Todo/Shopping list hybrid packed with goodies

cafeTriangle.description: Cafe Triangle was the first fully functioning hosted website I ever made. When I first started learning web dev I made it my one year goal to create our shops website. This is the final project. I especially love the vibrant but subdued user interface.
cafeTriangle.features: Multi-lingual functionality for EN/JP/ES,Dark/Light Modes,Responsive Design,Optimized for Speed

codeChicano.description: Code Chicano is a fully functioning C.R.U.D application with Firebase as its backend. It is also made with a quill editor so I am able to login and write new blog posts any time I want. The blog is fully responsive with many great features and funtionality.
codeChicano.features: Firebase Authentication,Firebase Database,Quill Editor,A.I Generated Artwork,Dark/Light Modes,Responsive Design,Custom U.I. Components

cosmicNeighborhood.description: Cosmic Neighborhood is an expanded and enhanced version of a Frontend Mentor challenge. Users can explore the planets of our solar system in an interactive and informative way. One of the standout features of this project is the interactive 3D models of the planets, created using Three.js. Users can zoom in, view the planets from different angles, and engage with the models for a more dynamic experience.
cosmicNeighborhood.features: Three JS 3D Models of Planets,Beautiful user interface,CSS animations

horizontalScrollGallery.description: This was more of a passion project. For some reason I always found horizontal scroll websites to be lovely. So I decided to showcase my photography using GSAP scroll trigger and horizontal scroll which was much trickier than I expected. The project was very time consuming but worth it in the end.
horizontalScrollGallery.features: Complex scroll trigger animations,Responsive design,Beautiful user interface

myPortfolioSite.description: I tried to give my portfolio site a colorful but simple and informative user interface. Visitors of my site are also able to toggle dark mode, browse in English, Spanish, or Japanese. Furthermore, I paid great attention to making sure the site was easily understandable and informative to prospective hirers.
myPortfolioSite.features: Responsive design, multi-lingual functionality, beautiful and informative user interface, proper semantic HTML for good accessibility

fullFeaturedTodoList.description: This is a full-featured to-do and shopping list app, built using Vue 3, that offers a sleek and interactive user experience with a variety of advanced features like dark/light mode, Firebase login, priority-based task sorting, and visual progress tracking. The app also includes gamification elements like a point system and celebratory animations for completed tasks, making task management more engaging.
fullFeaturedTodoList.technologies: Vue, Tailwind CSS, Vue Toastification, Pinia, Vue Circle Progress Bar, Firebase Login and Authentication, Canvas Confetti, VueJs tour
fullFeaturedTodoList.features: Responsive design, dark and light modes, Firebase login and authentication, Vue Js tour for first time users, Todo list or Shopping list modes available, full C.R.U.D operations, task prioritization and sorting, visual progress bar, point system with canvas confetti and time challene for gameficiation.
